data.text: An-gi wach e chunya mowuok kuom Nyasaye,
Nikech chunye wuonde kendo owuondore kende,
Weche mawuok e dhoge richo kendo gin miriambo;
Kata konindo e kitandane, to ochano timo gima rach;
Herani ochopo nyaka e polo malo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye;
Timni makare chalo gi gode madongo,
Mano kaka herani ma ok rum nengone tek, yaye Nyasaye!
Gichamo chiemo mangʼeny e hekalu mari ka gimor;
Nimar in ema in gi soko mar pi mar ngima;
Med nyiso herani ni joma ongʼeyi,
Mad tiend joma sungore kik nyona,
Neye kaka joma timo gik maricho oriere piny kopodho
